exception.title: This Java file should be opened using normal Java editor.

exceptions.exception: You are attempting to open {0} using the WindowBuilder Editor. However, this class is just the companion of the corresponding XWT file, which you should open instead. You can navigate between the corresponding XWT and Java files using the shortcut Shift+F12 by default.

exception.title: This Composite can not have a Layout.

exceptions.exception: You are attempting to get a Layout for {0}. However, by its design, you should not do this.
